definitions: 憧れる[あこがれる] (v1, vi) to long for, to yearn after, to admire, to be attracted by
english: …I used to want to be like Sephiroth, so I joined SOLDIER.
japanese: ……俺はセフィロスに[あこがれ]てソルジャーになったんだ

definitions: 親しい[したしい] (adj-i) close (e.g. friend), familiar, friendly, intimate,familiar (e.g. story), well-known (to one),close (relatives), closely related
近しい[ちかしい] (adj-i) intimate, close
english: After working with Sephiroth on several missions, we became friends.
japanese: いくつかの作戦をセフィロスといっしょにこなすうちに俺たちは[親しく]なった

definitions: 親友[しんゆう] (n) close friend, bosom (old, intimate) friend, buddy, crony, chum
english: You call that a friend?
japanese: [親友]ってやつか？

definitions: 戦友[せんゆう] (n) comrade in arms, war buddy, fellow soldier
english: So I guess you'd call us war buddies… We trusted each other. Until one day…
japanese: [戦友]……かな。俺たちは信頼しあっていた。あのときまでは……

definitions: 終結[しゅうけつ] (n, vs, adj-no) end, close
english: After the war it was SOLDIER's duty to put down any resistance against the Shinra.
japanese: 戦争[終結]後のソルジャーの任務は神羅に反抗する人たちを……。ゆううつな仕事が多かったな

definitions: 任務[にんむ] (n) duty, function, office, mission, task
english: After the war it was SOLDIER's duty to put down any resistance against the Shinra.
japanese: 戦争終結後のソルジャーの[任務]は神羅に反抗する人たちを……。ゆううつな仕事が多かったな

definitions: 反抗[はんこう] (n, vs) opposition, resistance, insubordination, defiance, hostility, rebellion
english: After the war it was SOLDIER's duty to put down any resistance against the Shinra.
japanese: 戦争終結後のソルジャーの任務は神羅に[反抗]する人たちを……。ゆううつな仕事が多かったな

definitions: 憂鬱[ゆううつ] (n, adj-na) depression, melancholy, dejection, gloom, despondency

japanese: 戦争終結後のソルジャーの任務は神羅に反抗する人たちを……。[ゆううつ]な仕事が多かったな

definitions: 歳[さい] (suf, ctr) -years-old
年[とし] (n) year,age, years,past one's prime, old age
年[とせ] (ctr) counter for years (following a number in the hito-futa-mi counting system)
english: I was 16…
japanese: 俺は１６[歳]だった……

definitions: 雨[あめ] (n) rain
english: It sure is raining hard.
japanese: すごい[雨]だな

definitions: 酔い[よい] (n) drunkenness, intoxication,motion sickness, travel sickness
english: I wouldn't know…
japanese: 俺は乗り物[酔い]なんてなったことないからな

definitions: 落ち着ける[おちつける] (v1, vt) to quiet, to calm down, to compose oneself, to settle down

japanese: もうすこし[おちつけ]-

definitions: 支給[しきゅう] (n, vs) provision, supply, payment, allowance, grant
english: They gave me some new Materia.

definitions: 昇格[しょうかく] (n, vs, adj-no) raising of status, promotion, advance
english: But by the time I made First Class, the war was already over.
japanese: それなのにクラス１ＳＴに[昇格]したのと同時に戦争が終わってしまった

definitions: 者[もの] (n) person

物[もの] (pref) thing, object, article, stuff, substance,one's things, possessions, property, belongings,things, something, anything, everything, nothing,quality,reason, the way of things,used to emphasize emotion, judgment, etc., used to indicate a common occurrence in the past (after a verb in past tense), used to indicate a general tendency, used to indicate something that should happen,item classified as ..., item related to ..., work of ...,cause of ..., cause for ...,somehow, somewhat, for some reason,really, truly
モノ (n) mono
もの (prt) indicates reason or excuse,indicates dissatisfaction, indicates desire to be pampered or indulged

japanese: だから、そういうチャンスがあるなら俺は絶対に[モノ]にしてみせる

definitions: 老朽[ろうきゅう] (n, vs) decrepitude, senescence, superannuation

japanese: 今回の任務は[老朽]化した魔晄炉の調査だ

definitions: 動作[どうさ] (n, vs) action, movements, motions, bearing, behaviour, behavior, execution, actuation, operation, manners

definitions: 起こす[おこす] (v5s, vt) to raise, to raise up, to set up, to pick up,to wake, to wake up, to waken, to awaken,to cause, to bring about, to lead to, to trigger, to give rise to, to create, to generate (e.g. heat, electricity), to produce,to start, to begin, to launch, to establish, to found, to set up, to open,to plough, to plow, to till,to fall ill with,to transcribe, to write down (what is spoken),to turn over (a card)

definitions: 生まれ故郷[うまれこきょう] (n) one's birthplace

japanese: ニブルヘイムは俺の[生まれ故郷]なんだ

definitions: 突っ込む[つっこむ] (v5m, vi) to thrust (something) into (something), to cram, to stuff, to shove,to plunge into, to charge into, to rush into, to ram into, to crash into,to delve into (a matter), to go into depth, to get to the heart (of something),to press (someone) about, to point out (e.g. an inconsistency), to question sharply, to grill,to get involved with, to meddle in, to poke one's nose into,to riposte, to retort, to quip

japanese: 俺か？　俺はセフィロスの戦いぶりに[みとれ]ていたな

japanese: ええと……[両親]は？

definitions: 生む[うむ] (v5m, vt) to give birth, to bear (child), to lay (eggs),to produce, to yield, to give rise to, to deliver
english: My mother is Jenova. She died right after she gave birth to me. My father…
japanese: 母の名はジェノバ。オレを[生ん]ですぐに死んだ。父は……

definitions: 父[ちち] (n) father
english: My mother is Jenova. She died right after she gave birth to me. My father…
japanese: 母の名はジェノバ。オレを生んですぐに死んだ。[父]は……

japanese: 幼なじみの[再会]ね！

japanese: ……TIFAには[おどろかさ]れたな

僭す[せんす] (v5s) to usurp boastfully
english: TIFA has good sense. She'll be a powerful fighter.
japanese: TIFAは[センス]が良いな。彼女は強くなるぞ

definitions: 流[りゅう] (n) fashion, way, style, manner,school (of thought),class, rank, rate,current (electrical, water, etc.), flow, stream
流[る] (n) exile
english: And if you see anything you can use, you might want to incorporate some of my techniques.
japanese: 使えるようだったらザンガン[流]格闘術に取り入れるのもいいな

definitions: 格闘[かくとう] (n, vs) hand-to-hand fighting, grappling, scuffling
english: And if you see anything you can use, you might want to incorporate some of my techniques.
japanese: 使えるようだったらザンガン流[格闘]術に取り入れるのもいいな

definitions: 術[じゅつ] (n, n-suf) art, technique,means, way,trick, trap, plot, stratagem,magic
術[すべ] (n) way, method, means
english: And if you see anything you can use, you might want to incorporate some of my techniques.
japanese: 使えるようだったらザンガン流格闘[術]に取り入れるのもいいな

definitions: 取り入れる[とりいれる] (v1, vt) to harvest, to reap,to take in, to gather in,to adopt (e.g. idea), to accept (e.g. advice), to introduce, to borrow (e.g. word)
english: And if you see anything you can use, you might want to incorporate some of my techniques.
japanese: 使えるようだったらザンガン流格闘術に[取り入れる]のもいいな

definitions: 全然[ぜんぜん] (adv) not at all (with neg. verb),wholly, entirely, completely
english: My mom…she was a vibrant woman. Hadn't changed at all.
japanese: 母さんは……元気な人だった。[全然]変わってなかった

definitions: 晴れ姿[はれすがた] (n) appearing in one's finest clothes, appearing in one's hour of triumph
english: Come, come… Let me take a look at you!
japanese: どれどれ……[晴れ姿]、母さんにもよ～く見せておくれ

definitions: 惚れ惚れ[ほれぼれ] (adv, adv-to, vs) fondly, admiringly, with fascination, with adoration, with enchantment
english: You look so handsome.
japanese: [ほれぼれ]しちゃうねえ

definitions: ご飯[ごはん] (n) cooked rice,meal
誤判[ごはん] (n) misjudgement, misjudgment, erroneous judgement, miscarriage of justice
午飯[ごはん] (n) lunch
english: Are you eating right?
japanese: ちゃんと[ゴハン]は食べてるのかい？

definitions: 背伸び[せのび] (n, vs) standing on tiptoe and stretching one's back to make oneself taller, stretching oneself,overreaching oneself, overstretching oneself, trying to do something beyond one's ability, pushing to the limit
english: Received "Orthopedic Underwear!"
japanese: 『ちょっと[背のび]パンツ』を手にいれた！

definitions: 真面目[まじめ] (adj-na, n) serious, honest, sober, grave, earnest, steady
真面目[しんめんもく] (n) one's true character, one's true self, oneself,seriousness, earnestness
english: We're talking about something really important here.
japanese: 今はすごく[真面目]な話をしているんでしょ？

definitions: 当て[あて] (suf) aim, object, purpose, end,expectations, prospects, hopes,something that can be relied upon,snack served with alcoholic drink,pad, guard,blow, strike,addressed to,per
父[ちち] (n) father
私[あたし] (pn) I, me
english: Did you read it? My letter?
japanese: もしかして読んだの？私[あて]の手紙

definitions: 内容[ないよう] (n) contents, content, substance, matter, detail, import
english: You remember what it said?
japanese: [内容]もおぼえているとか……

definitions: はっきり (vs) clearly, plainly, distinctly,to be clear, to be definite, to be certain, to be exact, to become clear, to clear up
english: I remember clearly
japanese: [はっきり]と

definitions: 続き[つづき] (n, n-suf) sequel, continuation, (also suffix) continuation (in time and space), second series, succession, spell
english: Then, let's go on with the story about Sephiroth.
japanese: それじゃあ、セフィロスの話の[続き]を聞かせて？

definitions: 万[まん] (n, adj-no) 10,000, ten thousand,myriad,everything, all,various
english: It was a letter addressed to TIFA from the son of the guy that runs the General Store…
japanese: [よろず]屋の息子がTIFAに書いた手紙だった……

definitions: 連絡[れんらく] (adj-no) to contact, to get in touch,contacting, getting in touch, communication, call, message,connection, coordination, junction,intercalary, intercalaris, internuncial
english: Yesterday, all of Nibelheim got together to welcome me. The only person that we couldn't get a hold of was CLOUD.
japanese: きのうはニブルヘイム出身の仲間たちが集まってくれたんだ。あ、CLOUDだけは[連絡]先がわからなくて呼べなかったけど

definitions: 仲[なか] (n) relation, relationship
牙婆[すあい] (n) broker, brokerage, brokerage fee
english: But everyone said he wasn't really that close to us. So even if we asked, he probably wouldn't have come anyway.
japanese: でも、アイツはもともとみんなと[仲]が良かったわけでもないしきっと呼んでもつまらないからまあ、いいんじゃないかってみんなと話してた

definitions: 詰まる[つまる] (v5r, vi) to be packed (with), to be full (space, schedule, etc.),to be blocked (road, pipe, etc.), to be clogged, to be plugged up,to shorten (width, interval, etc.), to shrink (shirt, word form, etc.), to narrow,to be at a loss, to be hard pressed,to end up, to be settled,to become a geminate consonant,to hit the ball near the handle of the bat
english: But everyone said he wasn't really that close to us. So even if we asked, he probably wouldn't have come anyway.
japanese: でも、アイツはもともとみんなと仲が良かったわけでもないしきっと呼んでも[つまら]ないからまあ、いいんじゃないかってみんなと話してた

definitions: 迚も[とても] (adv) very, awfully, exceedingly,(not) at all, by no means, simply (cannot)
english: Even the rooms of people in the slums are clean.
japanese: スラムの人たちでさえ部屋の中は[とても]きれいなんだ

definitions: お洒落[おしゃれ] (vs) smartly dressed, stylish, fashion-conscious,someone smartly dressed,to dress up, to be fashionable
english: Right now I'm living in the slums, but I plan to move to a really nice room, like the ones I've seen in magazines, once I make some money.
japanese: 今はお金がないからスラムに住んでいるけどいつかは本で見たような[オシャレ]な部屋に住んでやるつもりだ

definitions: 実家[じっか] (n) (one's parents') home
english: I wonder if it's too late to go back. Sometimes I think I should've taken over my parents' store.
japanese: もうあともどりはできないかな。[実家]のよろず屋を継げば良かったなと思う

definitions: 継ぐ[つぐ] (v5g, vt) to succeed (a person, to a position, etc.), to inherit, to take over, to follow,to patch (clothes), to mend, to repair,to add (e.g. charcoal to the fire), to replenish with, to feed with, to follow up with (e.g. remarks), to gather (one's breath)
english: I wonder if it's too late to go back. Sometimes I think I should've taken over my parents' store.
japanese: もうあともどりはできないかな。実家のよろず屋を[継げ]ば良かったなと思う

definitions: 何より[なにより] (exp, adj-no, adv, n) most, best, above all
english: And most of all, how are you, TIFA? It feels like I haven't seen you for years.
japanese: [何より]TIFA、どうしてる？もう何年も会っていないような気分だよ

definitions: アイドル (adj-f) young star, young entertainer, heartthrob, TV personality, idol,idol, image,idle
english: Everyone likes you. But because everyone idolizes you, I couldn't very well stab them in the back.
japanese: みんなTIFAが好きなんだ。でも、TIFAはみんなの[アイドル]だったから仲間を裏切ることができなかった

definitions: 裏切る[うらぎる] (v5r, vt) to betray, to turn traitor to, to double-cross
english: Everyone likes you. But because everyone idolizes you, I couldn't very well stab them in the back.
japanese: みんなTIFAが好きなんだ。でも、TIFAはみんなのアイドルだったから仲間を[裏切る]ことができなかった

definitions: 格好[かっこう] (n-suf) shape, form, figure, posture, pose,appearance,state, situation,suitable, fit, reasonable,about
括弧[かっこ] (n, vs, adj-no) parentheses, brackets
english: I always acted cool, but actually, I was just afraid of being jilted.
japanese: なーんて[カッコ]つけてたけど本当は告白してフラれるのが恐かっただけなんだよ

definitions: 告白[こくはく] (n, vs, adj-no) confession, acknowledgement, acknowledgment,profession of love,confession of sins (e.g. the confessional)
english: I always acted cool, but actually, I was just afraid of being jilted.
japanese: なーんてカッコつけてたけど本当は[告白]してフラれるのが恐かっただけなんだよ

definitions: フラ (n) hula (dance)
english: I always acted cool, but actually, I was just afraid of being jilted.
japanese: なーんてカッコつけてたけど本当は告白して[フラ]れるのが恐かっただけなんだよ

definitions: ラブレター (n) love letter
english: Wow, if I keep writing like this, this'll become a love letter!
japanese: あ、これ以上書くと[ラブレター]になってしまう！

definitions: 返事[へんじ] (n, vs) reply, answer, response
english: P.S.  Write me back, okay?
japanese: Ｐ・Ｓ　[返事]すごく欲しい

definitions: 見回り[みまわり] (n) patrolling
english: Making the rounds?
japanese: [見回り]ですか？

definitions: 反る[そる] (v5r, vi) to warp, to curve, to arch, to bend,to bend backward (body or body part, e.g. fingers)
剃る[そる] (v5r, vt) to shave
ソル (n) Sol
english: SALTZA?
japanese: [そる]ざ？

definitions: 遣っ付ける[やっつける] (v1, vt) to beat, to attack (an enemy), to do away with, to finish off
english: Are you going to kill the monsters?
japanese: モンスター[やっつける]の？

definitions: かっ (pref) [object Object]
english: He's soooo cool!!
japanese: [カッ]コイ～！！

definitions: 故意[こい] (n) intent, intention, (on) purpose, bad faith,mens rea (guilty mind)
恋[こい] (n) (romantic) love
鯉[こい] (n) common carp (Cyprinus carpio), koi carp
濃い[こい] (adj-i) deep (colour), dark,strong (flavour, smell, etc.),thick (consistency), dense,strong (possibility, etc.),thick (i.e. "as thick as thieves"), close, deep (love, etc.)
古意[こい] (n) ancient ways, the feelings of the ancients
請い[こい] (n) request, entreaty
コイ (n) Khoi (people), Khoikhoi, Khoi-khoin
こい (suf, adj-i) rich in ..., high in ..., full of ..., very ..., quite ...
来い[こい] (exp) come!, [object Object]
english: He's soooo cool!!
japanese: カッ[コイ]～！！

definitions: 逞しい[たくましい] (adj-i) burly, strong, sturdy,indomitable, indefatigable, strong-willed, resolute, bold,robust (vitality, appetite, economic growth, etc.), strong
english: CLOUD, you've grown up to be a strong man.
japanese: CLOUDくん、なかなか[たくましく]なったわね

definitions: 焦れったい[じれったい] (adj-i) vexing, irritating, impatient
english: Now you're pissin' me off!! This don't matter, so get on with it!
japanese: [じれったい]ぜ！関係ないなら先を聞かせろ！

definitions: 作る[つくる] (v5r, vt) to make, to produce, to manufacture, to build, to construct,to prepare (food), to brew (alcohol),to raise, to grow, to cultivate, to train,to till,to draw up (a document), to make out, to prepare, to write,to create (an artistic work, etc.), to compose,to coin (a phrase), to organize, to organise, to establish, to found,to have (a child),to make up (one's face, etc.),to fabricate (an excuse, etc.),to give a (false) appearance, to feign (a smile, etc.), to put on a show of emotion,to form (a line, etc.),to set (a record),to commit (a sin, etc.)
english: A Mako Reactor was built in Mt. Nibel.
japanese: 魔晄炉はニブル山の中に[造ら]れていた

definitions: 寒々[さむざむ] (adv-to, vs) wintry, very cold-looking (e.g. landscape),bleak (e.g. room, street), desolate, empty (of furnishings)
english: The cold mountain air of Mt. Nibel
japanese: ニブルの山の[寒々]とした空気

definitions: 橋[はし] (n) bridge
橋[きょう] (n, adj-no) pons (pontes), pons Varolii, pontine, part of the brain stem (links the medulla oblongata and cerebellum with the midbrain)
english: Uh…the bridge!!

definitions: 洞窟[どうくつ] (n, adj-no) cavern, cave, cave system, grotto
english: These caves are intertwined, like an ant farm…
japanese: このへんの[洞窟]はアリのすみたいに入り組んでいるから……

definitions: 蟻[あり] (n) ant
在り[あり] (vr, vi) existing (at the present moment),alright, acceptable, passable,to be (usu. of inanimate objects), to have
english: These caves are intertwined, like an ant farm…
japanese: このへんの洞窟は[アリ]のすみたいに入り組んでいるから……

definitions: 入り組む[いりくむ] (v5m, vi) to be or become complicated
english: These caves are intertwined, like an ant farm…
japanese: このへんの洞窟はアリのすみたいに[入り組ん]でいるから……

definitions: 姿[すがた] (n-suf) figure, form, shape,appearance, dress, guise,state, condition, picture, image,form (of a waka),dressed in ..., wearing ...
english: Oh, and Sephiroth… One person seems to be missing…
japanese: それにセフィロスさん。１人、[姿]が見えないけど……

definitions: 泉[いずみ] (n) spring, fountain
english: A Mako fountain. It's a miracle of nature.
japanese: 魔晄の[泉]。自然の驚異というやつだな

definitions: 驚異[きょうい] (n, adj-no) wonder, miracle, amazement, prodigy
english: A Mako fountain. It's a miracle of nature.
japanese: 魔晄の泉。自然の[驚異]というやつだな

definitions: 凝縮[ぎょうしゅく] (n, vs) condensation (of ideas, emotions, etc.),condensation (of a vapour or gas)
english: Materia. When you condense Mako energy, Materia is produced.
japanese: マテリアだ。魔晄エネルギーが[凝縮]されるとマテリアができる

definitions: 天然[てんねん] (n, adj-no) nature, spontaneity,natural airhead
english: It's very rare to see Materia in its natural state.
japanese: [天然]のマテリアを見るなんてめったにない機会だ

definitions: 知識[ちしき] (n) knowledge, information
english: …the knowledge and wisdom of the Ancients is held in the Materia.
japanese: ……マテリアの中にはいわゆる古代種の[知識]が封じこまれている

definitions: 自在[じざい] (adj-na, n, adj-no) freely, at will
english: Anyone with this knowledge can freely use the powers of the land and the Planet. That knowledge interacts between ourselves and the Planet calling up magic…or so they say.
japanese: 大地、星の力を[自在]に操る知識。その知識が星と我々をむすびつけ魔法を呼び出す……といわれている

definitions: 操る[あやつる] (v5r, vt) to operate (e.g. a machine), to handle, to manage, to control, to maneuver, to steer,to have a good command of (a language), to play proficiently (of a musical instrument),to work (a puppet), to pull the strings of a puppet,to manipulate (a person, public opinion, etc.), to pull the strings, to control from the shadows, to mastermind
english: Anyone with this knowledge can freely use the powers of the land and the Planet. That knowledge interacts between ourselves and the Planet calling up magic…or so they say.
japanese: 大地、星の力を自在に[操る]知識。その知識が星と我々をむすびつけ魔法を呼び出す……といわれている

definitions: 結び付ける[むすびつける] (v1, vt) to combine, to join, to tie on, to attach with a knot, to bind (e.g. an address)
english: Anyone with this knowledge can freely use the powers of the land and the Planet. That knowledge interacts between ourselves and the Planet calling up magic…or so they say.
japanese: 大地、星の力を自在に操る知識。その知識が星と我々を[むすびつけ]魔法を呼び出す……といわれている

definitions: 偉大[いだい] (adj-na) great, grand, magnificent, outstanding, mighty
english: Hojo of Shinra, Inc…. An inexperienced man assigned to take over the work of a great scientist.
japanese: 神羅カンパニーの宝条。[偉大]な科学者の仕事を引き継いだみじゅくな男だ

definitions: 引き継ぐ[ひきつぐ] (v5g, vt) to take over, to hand over
english: Hojo of Shinra, Inc…. An inexperienced man assigned to take over the work of a great scientist.
japanese: 神羅カンパニーの宝条。偉大な科学者の仕事を[引き継い]だみじゅくな男だ

definitions: コンプレックス (n) complex
english: He was a walking mass of complexes.
japanese: [コンプレックス]のかたまりのような男だな

definitions: 遠回り[とおまわり] (n) detour, roundabout way
english: We finally made it. We sure took the long way though.
japanese: ついたわ。ずいぶん[遠回り]しちゃったけどね

definitions: 一般人[いっぱんじん] (n) ordinary person, member of the general public, non-celebrity
english: Only authorized people are allowed in. This place is full of Shinra's industrial secrets.
japanese: この中は[一般人]立入禁止だ。神羅の企業秘密でいっぱいだからな

definitions: 企業[きぎょう] (n) enterprise, business, company, corporation
english: Only authorized people are allowed in. This place is full of Shinra's industrial secrets.
japanese: この中は一般人立入禁止だ。神羅の[企業]秘密でいっぱいだからな

definitions: バルブ (n) bulb,valve
english: CLOUD, close the valve.
japanese: CLOUD、[バルブ]を閉じてくれ

definitions: 閉じる[とじる] (v1, vt, vi) to close (e.g. book, eyes, meeting, etc.), to shut
english: CLOUD, close the valve.
japanese: CLOUD、バルブを[閉じ]てくれ

definitions: 今年[ことし] (n-adv, n-t) this year
english: But doing this will never put you on the same level as Professor Gast.
japanese: でもな、こんな[ことし]たってあんたはガスト博士にはかなわないのさ

definitions: 冷やす[ひやす] (v5s, vt) to cool (from room temperature), to chill, to refrigerate,to calm down, to cool off, to regain one's composure, to relax,to be frightened (at), to be scared (of)
english: This is a system that condenses and freezes the Mako energy… that is, when it's working correctly.
japanese: これは魔晄エネルギーを凝縮してさらに[冷やす]システムだ………本来はな

definitions: 本来[ほんらい] (adj-no, n-adv) originally, primarily,essentially, intrinsically, naturally, by nature, in (and of) itself,proper, rightful, legal, normal
english: This is a system that condenses and freezes the Mako energy… that is, when it's working correctly.
japanese: これは魔晄エネルギーを凝縮してさらに冷やすシステムだ………[本来]はな

definitions: 比べ物[くらべもの] (n) something worthy of comparison, something being compared
english: But, what are they? They've been exposed to a far higher degree of Mako than you.
japanese: しかし、こいつらはなんだ？おまえたちとは[比べもの]にならないほど高密度の魔晄に浸されている

definitions: 高密度[こうみつど] (n) high density
english: But, what are they? They've been exposed to a far higher degree of Mako than you.
japanese: しかし、こいつらはなんだ？おまえたちとは比べものにならないほど[高密度]の魔晄に浸されている

definitions: 浸す[ひたす] (v5s, vt) to soak, to dip, to steep, to immerse,to moisten, to wet
english: But, what are they? They've been exposed to a far higher degree of Mako than you.
japanese: しかし、こいつらはなんだ？おまえたちとは比べものにならないほど高密度の魔晄に[浸さ]れている

definitions: 生み出す[うみだす] (v5s, vt) to create, to bring forth, to produce,to invent, to think up and bring into being,to give birth to, to bear
english: Exactly. And it's Hojo of Shinra that produced these monsters.
japanese: そうだ。モンスターを[生み出し]たのは神羅カンパニーの宝条だ

definitions: 作り出す[つくりだす] (v5s, vt) to manufacture, to produce, to raise (crops),to invent, to dream up, to create
english: Mutated living organisms produced by Mako energy. That's what these monsters really are.
japanese: 魔晄エネルギーが[創り出す]異形の生物。それがモンスターの正体

definitions: 異形[いぎょう] (adj-no, adj-na, n) fantastic, grotesque, strange-looking, suspicious-looking
異形[いけい] (n, adj-no) atypical appearance, atypicality, heteromorphy
english: Mutated living organisms produced by Mako energy. That's what these monsters really are.
japanese: 魔晄エネルギーが創り出す[異形]の生物。それがモンスターの正体

definitions: 正体[しょうたい] (n) true character, true form, true colors (colours), identity, truth (of a mystery, phenomenon, etc.), origin,consciousness, one's senses
english: Mutated living organisms produced by Mako energy. That's what these monsters really are.
japanese: 魔晄エネルギーが創り出す異形の生物。それがモンスターの[正体]

definitions: 正しく[まさしく] (adv) surely, no doubt, evidently
english: You saw it! All of them…were humans…
japanese: お前も見ただろう！こいつらの中にいるのは……[まさしく]人間だ……

definitions: 作る[つくる] (v5r, vt) to make, to produce, to manufacture, to build, to construct,to prepare (food), to brew (alcohol),to raise, to grow, to cultivate, to train,to till,to draw up (a document), to make out, to prepare, to write,to create (an artistic work, etc.), to compose,to coin (a phrase), to organize, to organise, to establish, to found,to have (a child),to make up (one's face, etc.),to fabricate (an excuse, etc.),to give a (false) appearance, to feign (a smile, etc.), to put on a show of emotion,to form (a line, etc.),to set (a record),to commit (a sin, etc.)
english: I was even more surprised that Shinra was producing monsters.
japanese: 俺はなによりも神羅カンパニーがモンスターを[創っ]ていたということにショックをうけていた

definitions: 此処いら[ここいら] (n) around here, in this vicinity, this area
english: Yeah, maybe so. Wanna take a breather here?
japanese: た、確かにそうかもな。[ここいら]で一息いれることにするか

definitions: 一息[ひといき] (n, adj-no) one breath, pause, rest,one go (i.e. in a short time),small amount of effort
english: Yeah, maybe so. Wanna take a breather here?
japanese: た、確かにそうかもな。ここいらで[一息]いれることにするか

definitions: 年来[ねんらい] (n-adv, n-t) for some years
english: That would seem to explain the increase in the number of monsters recently.
japanese: ここ数[年来]のモンスターの増加にはそういった理由があったのか

definitions: 増加[ぞうか] (n, vs) increase, rise, growth, addition, increment
english: That would seem to explain the increase in the number of monsters recently.
japanese: ここ数年来のモンスターの[増加]にはそういった理由があったのか

definitions: 理由[りゆう] (n) reason, pretext, motive
english: That would seem to explain the increase in the number of monsters recently.
japanese: ここ数年来のモンスターの増加にはそういった[理由]があったのか

definitions: 籠もる[こもる] (v5r, vi) to shut oneself in (e.g. one's room), to be confined in, to seclude oneself, to hide away, to stay inside (one's shell),to be filled with (emotion, enthusiasm, etc.),to fill the room (of a gas, smell, etc.), to be heavy with (e.g. smoke), to be stuffy, to be dense,to be muffled (e.g. voice),to hold (a castle, fortress, etc.),to confine oneself in a temple to pray
english: We returned to Nibelheim. Sephiroth confined himself to the inn. He didn't even try to talk to me.
japanese: 俺たちはニブルヘイムへもどった。セフィロスは宿屋に[こもり]誰とも言葉をかわそうとしない

definitions: 生まれる[うまれる] (v1, vi) to be born
english: The villagers used to call it the Shinra mansion.
japanese: 村の人たちは神羅屋敷と呼んでいたわ。私たちが[生まれ]たころにはもう空き家になっていて……

definitions: 空き家[あきや] (n) vacant house, unoccupied house
english: The villagers used to call it the Shinra mansion.
japanese: 村の人たちは神羅屋敷と呼んでいたわ。私たちが生まれたころにはもう[空き家]になっていて……

definitions: ファ (n) fa, fah, 4th note in the tonic solfa representation of the diatonic scale
english: Fa [OK]
japanese: ○ボタン　[ファ]

definitions: 祖[そ] (n) ancestor, forefather, progenitor
俎[そ] (n) altar of sacrifice
素[そ] (adj-na, n, adj-no) plain, white silk,prime
ソ (n) soh, so, 5th note in the tonic solfa representation of the diatonic scale
疎[そ] (adj-na, n) sparse,distant (of a relationship), estranged, alienated
疽[そ] (n) type of carbuncle
酥[そ] (n, n-suf, n-pref) condensed milk,Soviet Union
其[そ] (n) that,he, she, that person
租[そ] (n) rice tax (ritsuryo system), rice levy, tax on rice fields,annual tribute, annual tax
english: So [PAGEUP] or [PAGEDOWN] + [CANCEL]
japanese: Ｒ１ボタンかＬ１ボタンと×ボタン　[ソ]

definitions: 味噌[みそ] (n) miso, [object Object],innards (from crabs, shrimps, etc.) resembling miso,key (main) point, good part (of something),weakling, weak person
三十日[みそか] (n) last day of the month
三十[さんじゅう] (num) thirty
english: Do Mi So  (C)Directional button Down
japanese: 方向キー下　ド[ミソ]（Ｃ）
